resources.string: App Would Like to Access the Camera and Microphone
App needs the Microphone and Camera permissions in order to call.
App Would Like to Access the Camera and Microphone

App needs the Microphone and Camera permissions in order to call, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Microphone\" and \"Camera\".
Camera and Microphone are granted you can use them
